title: How many songs did Bob Dylan write in total? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes’n how many songs must a man write down , before they call him a man ? It is a holy crap I can’t believe it number . Not only that . A lot of his songs have thousands [ slight exaggeration for effect ] of verses . Whatever number you find satisfies the question . Double it . He wrote songs that most people would have tried to get 15 songs out of . He wrote stories too ! Opuses . Illiads . Not a lot of pop bubblegum “ I love you , why don’t you love me “ stuff .

That is probably impossible to determine. He has written many that he never recorded or had published. He even wrote exerts of songs that he passed on to other songwriters to finish. “Wagon Wheel” by Old Crow Medicine Show (later covered by Darius Rucker) was one such song.
